actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 93-1120.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #319 (278-16).
Referred to Senate Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, S. Rept. 93-1014.
Motion to lay on table the motion to recommit the bill passed Senate, roll call #323 (54-35).
Measure passed Senate, amended, roll call #324 (71-16).
Conference report filed in House, H. Rept. 93-1227.
House agreed to conference report, roll call #418 (351-41).
House receded and concurred in certain Senate amendments.
Senate agreed to conference report, roll call #337 (67-26).
Senate agreed to the House amendment to Senate amendment.
Referred bill and veto message to House Appropriations Committee.

official_title: A bill making appropriations for Agriculture-Environmental and Consumer Protection programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
short_title: Agriculture - Environmental and Consumer Protection Appropriation Act

summary.text: Agriculture-Environmental and Consumer Protection Appropriation Act - Makes appropriations for Agriculture-Environmental and Consumer Protection programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, including: (1) Department of Agriculture programs, corporations and agencies; (2) rural development programs and funds; (3) environmental programs of independent agencies; and (4) consumer programs of the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare, the Food and Drug Administration, and the General Services Administration.

titles.title: Agriculture - Environmental and Consumer Protection Appropriation Act
A bill making appropriations for Agriculture-Environmental and Consumer Protection programs for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975.
